'''''Amon Hen'' 298''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in December [[2022]].

==Contents==
*Front and back cover art: Death of Elenwë by Sara Morello
*'''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
*'''4''' - Bilbo Baggins as a Literary Embodiment of J.R.R. Tolkien by Emilian Wojnowski
*'''8''' - Poem: Théodred by Eren Goetz
*'''10''' - From Goth Persephone to our Lady of Sorrows: The Evolving Nature of Nienna by Marilyn R. Pukkila
*'''17''' - Oxonmoot
*'''18''' - Centerfold: Winter in the Shire by [[Matěj Čadil]]
*'''20''' - Snow Games by Helen Armstrong
*'''24''' - Review of [[The Fall of Númenor|The Fall of Númenor: and Other Tales from the Second Age of Middle-earth]] by Amanda Drak
*'''26''' - Lembas Extra 2022 Númenor by [[Brian Sibley]]
*'''28''' - Call for Papers: The Mighty and Frail Númenor
*'''32''' - Behind Glass Doors by Ian Collier
*'''34''' - All Brân
